headline: Why the World Is Suddenly Awash With a Wave of Co-CEOs
summary: Comcast, Oracle, and more have named Co-CEOs. The structure has worked in the past, but some say it makes no sense.

raw.headline: Why the World Is Suddenly Awash With a Wave of Co-CEOs

headline: NBCUniversal-YouTube TV distribution fight highlights streaming's new power struggle
summary: (Reuters) -Popular NBC shows including "Sunday Night Football" and "America's Got Talent" may disappear from YouTube TV as soon as Tuesday if the two sides fail to agree on a new distribution deal, a standoff that could influence the future of television.  Carriage talks have stalled over the rates Alphabet's YouTube TV will pay to distribute to its 10 million subscribers the shows of Comcast-owned NBCUniversal, the two companies have said.  But a bigger negotiation looms behind the scenes, and it reflects the newfound clout of YouTube as the dominant provider of video services in the United States.

headline: Comcast Deploys Ciena Technology to Extend Fiber Impact
summary: HANOVER, Md., September 30, 2025--Comcast and Ciena (NYSE:CIEN) today announced that Comcast is deploying Ciena’s 5131 Coherent Access Platform (CAP) to help extend fiber connectivity faster and more efficiently.

headline: Wall Street Lunch: Spotify Top Boss Daniel Ek Transitions To Chairman Role
summary: Spotify (SPOT) CEO Daniel Ek is ceding his leadership role in the company, transitioning to executive chairman after nearly two decades at the helm.
